casebody.data:
C.O., R.O., and G.M.O., Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
PINE HILL SCHOOL DISTRICT BOARD OF EDUCATION, Doug Endee, and Patricia Israel, Defendants-Petitioners,
and
C.M. and A.M., Defendants
and
Pine Hill School District Board of Education, Doug Endee, and Patricia Israel, Third-Party Plaintiffs,
v.
D.C.M., Third-Party Defendant. C-591 September Term 2017
080361 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002617-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
